about_the_game:
Crashing Not Optional - the ultimate adrenaline-fueled racing experience that brings back the nostalgia of couch gaming with friends! Get ready for heart-pounding action as you navigate treacherous tracks filled with icy patches, oil spills, and chaotic obstacles in this 2.5D pixel art racing game.

Race against up to three friends or AI-controlled opponents on short yet intense tracks, each lasting just one minute. Choose from a variety of quirky vehicles, including a police car, an ice-cream truck, or a sleek roadster.

But beware, crashes are inevitable in "Crashing Not Optional"! Embrace the chaos as you battle for supremacy on the track, with collisions and spin-outs adding to the thrill of the race.

And it's not just about speed - engage in epic battles with your friends in various game modes, including the exhilarating Crown Capture. Grab the crown and hold onto it for as long as you can, dodging and weaving to avoid being tagged by rival players. Only the most skilled and cunning racer will emerge victorious!

Developed by a solo developer, "Crashing Not Optional" captures the essence of classic couch gaming, with its pixel art style and frantic multiplayer action. So gather your friends, grab some controllers, and get ready to crash, bash, and race your way to victory in Crashing Not Optional!

The full game includes:
  • 14 Unique Cars
  • 11 Different Colors
  • 12 Racing Tracks with 6 special obstacles
  • 2 Battle Modes
